subject: From: Mr Warren Edward Buffe
body:
From: Mr Warren Edward Buffett <ccccbnam@gmail.com>
Date: 3/30/22 
Whom:
Subject: RE: DONATION
My name is Warren E. Buffett an American business magnate, investor
and philanthropist. am the most successful investor in the world
today and Chairman of Berkshire Hathaway. I believe strongly
in'giving while living I had one idea that never changed in my mind
that you should use your wealth to help people and i have decided to
give {$ 2,500,000.00} Two Million Five Hundred Thousand United
Dollars, to randomly selected individuals worldwide.
On receipt of this email, you should count yourself as the lucky
individual. Your email address was chosen online while searching at
random.
Kindly get back to me at your earliest convenience, so I know your
email address is valid.
Visit this: https:/ /en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Warren_Buffett or You Can
Google my name for more information 
 Warren Buffett).
Send your reply to this e-mail (
webdonations2019@gmail.com
) to
enable me give you more details about this Donation.
Do make sure you provide me with your complete information below so I
forward it to my selected payout bank for disbursement.
============
Full Name:
Address:
Age:
Occupation:
Sex:
Mobile / Tel:
============
Reply me for more information on this e-mail (
webdonations2019@gmail.com
)
Best Regards,
Mr Warren Edward Buffett Billionaire investor
CEO: Berkshire Hathaway
http:/ /www.berkshirehathaway.com/

subject: Re:   From: Mr Warren Edward Buffe
body:
Hello Mr. Warren Edward Buffett,

Wow, I can't believe I'm actually receiving an email from you! It's such an honor. I've heard so much about your philanthropic efforts and it's truly inspiring.

I'm curious though, how did you come across my email address? And why did you choose to give this generous donation to random individuals? 

Looking forward to hearing more about this.

Best wishes,
Marie
